verses.content: Levi naupa Kohath, chu naupa Izhar, chu naupa Kora chun Eliab naupasalhai Dathan le Abiram le Peleth naupa On, Reuben thlahai leh mihai an ṭhuoi a.
Israel thlahai, mi inlâr deu deu mipui laia hotu, rorêltu thlanghai laia mi za hni le sâwmngahai leh Mosie hmaah an va feh a.

Mosie le Aron chu sawisêlin an pungkhâwm a, an kuomah, “In insukngêng êm el, mipuihai chu an inthieng seng sih a; LALPA khawm anni lai a um sih a; iengdinga LALPA mipui pungkhâwmhai chunga hin in insie chunghnung bîk am a na?” an ta.
Chu chu Mosien a hang hriet chun a bawkkhup a.
Kora le a pâwlhai po po kuoma chun, “Zingah zîngkâr LALPAIN a tahai le ân thienghai chu suklangin ama va hnai dingin hung tîng a ta, a thlanghai ngei chu ama va hnai dingin tîng a tih.
Hieng ang hin thaw ro, Kora le a pâwl po po hai;
zingah meilâkna dâm chawi unla, chutaka chun mei sie unla, LALPA hmaah riminhnik phul ro; chun, LALPAIN a thlang taphawt chu inthieng el a tih. Levi nauhai, in insukngêng êm el,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Mosien Kora kuomah, “Nangni Levi nauhai, ngai ta u,
LALPA biekbûka rawngbâwla, mipuihai hmaa an rawngbâwla ngîr dinga Israelhai Pathienin ama hnai dinga Israel mipuihai laia inthawka a suktum cheu a,
Levi naupasal in unauhai po po le ama hnai dinga ân umtir cheu hi thil chînah in ngai a ni maw? Thiempu nina khawm in la zawng sa rawp a ni maw?
Chuleiin, nang le i pâwlhai po po chu LALPA chu kalin in pung- khâwm a nih. Aron khawm hin ieng am a thawa a chunga hi chier in ni leh?” a ta.
Chun, Mosie chun Eliab nâupa Dathan le Abiram ân kotir a, anni chun, “Hung naw ning ungah!
Thlalêra mi sukhlum dingin nênetui le khuoizu luongna rama inthawkin i mi ṭhuoi suok hi thil chîn am a ni hrim luoh a? Kan chungah lalin în sie nâwk nghâl a.
Nênetui luongna ramah i mi ṭhuoi lût nawh a, lo le grêp huon ro ding i mi pêk bawk nawh; mi hlêm i tum a, hung naw ning ungah,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chu a lung a sen hle el tah a; LALPA kuomah, “An thilinhlân chu pawm naw rawh, an sabengtung chu pakhat khawm ka lâk nawh a, tukhawm ka sukna bawk nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Mosie chun Kora kuom- a chun, “Zîngah nang le i mi pungkhâwmhai nang leh, anni leh, Aron leh LALPA hmaah hung um ro, an mei lâkna chawi seng hai sienla,
riminhnik phul hai sienla, LALPA hmaa mei lâkna seng, mei- lâkna za hni le sâwmnga chu hung chawi raw hai se; nang le Aron khawmin in mei lâkna chawi ve ve ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mi tin chun an mei lâkna chu an chawi a, mei an sieh a, riminhnik an phul a; Mosie le Aron leh intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun an va ngîr a.
Chun, Kora chun mipui po po chu anni kalin intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun ân umkhâwmtir a; chun, mipuihai po po chunga chun LALPA ropuina a hung inlang a.
Chuongchun, LALPAIN Mosie le Aron a biek a,
“Hieng mipuihai laia inthawk hin insiekieng ro; ka hung sukbo- hmang thut theina dingin,” tiin.
Chuongchun, anni chu an bawk- khup a, “Aw Pathien, tisa po pohai thlarau Pathien, mi pakhat suol leiin mipui po po chungah i lunginsen ding am a nih?” an tih a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie a biek a,
“Mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Kora hai, Dathan hai, Abiram hai bûka inthawk hin inkiengsan vawng ro,’ tiin hril rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chu a tho a, Dathan le Abiram kuoma chun a va feh a; Israel upahai chun an zui a.
Chun, pungkhâwmhai kuoma chun, “Hieng mi suolhai puon ina inthawk dâm hin suok ro khai; an iengkhawm hi tâwk naw ro, chuong naw chun chu an suolna po poa hin ṭhang ve rawi in tih,” tiin a hril a.

Chuongchun, Kora hai, Dathan hai, Abiram hai bûka inthawkhai chun an suok ta dur dur el a; chun, Dathan le Abiram chu an puon ina inthawk chun an hung suok a, an puonin kawtkhâra chun an nuhmei- hai, an naupasalhai, an naunuhmei- hai le chun an ngir a.
Chun, Mosien, “Keia lungril puoksuoka thaw a ni nawh a, hieng thil thaw ding hin LALPAIN a mi tir a nih ti hienga hin hrieng in tih.
Hieng mihai po po hi mi dang thi dân ang bawkin an thi a, mi po po hrem ang bawka hrem an ni chun Pathienin a mi tir naw nîng a ta.
LALPAIN thil thar a siem a, hnuoiin a bâu a ka a, anni le an ta po po a lem a, Seolah a hringa an lût ruok chun hieng mihai hin LALPA an lo ngainêp a nih ti hrieng in tih,” a ta.
Chuong thu po po chu a hril zo chun, an hnuoi leihnuoi chu a hung kak ta phut el a,
chuongchun, leihnuoi chun a bâu chu a kah a, an sûngkuoin, Kora mihai po po, an thuomhnaw po po leh a lem zo vawng tâwl tah a.
Chuongchun, anni le an ta po po chu a hringin Seola chun an tlum ta vawng a, leihnuoi chun a bâu ân chîp nel a, pungkhâwm laia inthawk chu an bohmang tah a.
Chuongchun, an vêla Israel mi po pohai chu an khêk ria chun an tlân dar a, “Hnuoiin mi lem ve hlau rawi a tih,” an tih a.
Chun, LALPA kuoma inthawkin mei a hung suok a, riminhnik inhlântu mi za hni le sâwmnga hai chu a hung kâng hlum tah a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie a biek a,
“Thiempu Aron naupa Eleazar chu meia inthawka mei lâknahai chu la suok dingin hril la, sukdar neng raw se, thil inthieng a ni sih a,

mei lâknahai chu hieng thilsuol thawtuhaiin thi pha hiela an inhlân a ni sih a. Chuleiin, mâichâm inkhum- na phêk dinga sut ni raw se. LALPA hmaa inhlân an na, chuleiin, an inthieng a nih; chu chu Israel thlahai ta dinga inchikna nîng a tih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, thiempu Eleazar chun a kânghai dârsen mei lâknahai chu a lâk a, mâichâm inkhumnahai sut a ni tah a;
Mosie hmanga a kuoma LAL- PAIN a lo hril ta ang chun, Aron thla ni lo hnam dang hrim hrim LALPA hmaa riminhnik raw dinga an fe hnai nawna ding le, Kora le a pâwlhai anga an hung um nawna dingin.
Nisienlakhawm, a zînga chun, “LALPA mihai in sukhlum a nih,” tiin Israel thla pungkhâwm po po chu Mosie le Aron chunga chun an chier a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chunga mi- pui an pungkhâwm lai chun intuokna puon in tieng an nghah a; sûmin a hung inkhum le LALPA ropuina hung inlang chu an hmuh a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu intuok- na puon in tuola chun an va feh a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie a biek a,
“Hieng mipuihaia inthawk hin insiekieng ro, ka hung sukbohmang thut theina dingin,” tiin. Chun, anni chu an bawkkhup a.

Mosie chun Aron kuomah, “I mei lâkna chawi la, mâichâma inthawkin mei sie la, riminhnik phul la, mipui- hai lai chun fepui vat la, an ta dingin inremna siem rawh. LALPA kuoma inthawkin lunginsenna a hung suok a nih, hri ân lêng ṭan mêk a nih,” a ta.
Aron chun Mosie hril ang chun a chawi a, pungkhâwmhai laia chun a tlân lût tah a, hri chu mipui lai ân lêng ṭan tah ti a hmuh a, riminhnik chu a phul a, mipui ta ding chun inremna chu a siem a.
Mithi le mi hring inkâra chun a ngîr a, hri chu ân kieng tah a.
Chuongchun, Kora chungchâng thua thihai tiem loin hria thi po po chu sîng khat sâng li le za sari an nih.
Chun, Aron chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra Mosie kuoma chun a kîr nâwk a, chuongchun, hri chu ân kieng tah a.
